Ingest_LDD.name: Machine Learning Analysis
Ingest_LDD.comment:
This data dictionary enables the specification of metadata that describes products generated by the use of a machine learning model. It captures information about how the model was trained and evaluated.
## CHANGE LOG ##
1.2.1.0 -Create new parameter classes for Optimiztaion Algorithm, Preprocessing Method, Augmentation Method, and Calibration Method. -Update minimum and maximum occurences for several classes and attributes.
1.2.0.0 - Add several new classes: Optimization Algorithm; Augmentation Method; Preprocessing Method; Trained Model Hyperparameter; Trained Model Architecture; Calibration Method; Trained Model File. - Add trained_model_creation_date attribute to Trained Machine Learning Model class. - Add trained_model_objective_function_name and trained_model_objective_function_description to Machine Learning Algorithm class.
1.1.0.0 - Change data_set_size to data_set_count. - Expand attribute definitions. - Update steward name.
1.0.1.0 - Address Oxygen-flagged errors. - Make data_set_size a ASCII_NonNegative_Integer. - Update some attribute and class definitions. - Update README file per latest template. - Use PDS Information Model 1.18 (I).
1.0.0.0 - Initial release.

DD_Attribute.name: data_set_count
DD_Attribute.definition: The data_set_count attribute provides the number of items in the data set.

DD_Attribute.name: data_set_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The data_set_version_id attribute specifies the data set version number.

DD_Attribute.name: augmentation_method_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The augmentation_method_name attribute names any method by which an image was augmented, e.g. 180 degrees counterclockwise rotation; horizontal flipping; brightness adjustment.

DD_Attribute.name: augmentation_method_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The augmentation_method_description attribute describes the augmentation method in more detail.

DD_Attribute.name: augmentation_method_parameter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The augmentation_method_parameter_name attribute names any parameters, e.g. gamma.

DD_Attribute.name: augmentation_method_parameter_value
DD_Attribute.definition: The augmentation_method_parameter_value attribute specifies the value of the named parameter, e.g. for a parameter "gamma," the value could be [0.5, 1.5].

DD_Attribute.name: preprocessing_method_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The preprocessing_method_name attribute names any method by which an image was preprocessed, e.g. center cropping.

DD_Attribute.name: preprocessing_method_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The preprocessing_method_description attribute describes the preprocessing method in more detail.

DD_Attribute.name: preprocessing_method_parameter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The preprocessing_method_parameter_name attribute names any preprocessing parameters.

DD_Attribute.name: preprocessing_method_parameter_value
DD_Attribute.definition: The preprocessing_method_parameter_value attribute specifies the value of the named preprocessing parameter.

DD_Attribute.name: algorithm_learning_style
DD_Attribute.definition: The algorithm_learning_style attribute describes the type of learning style employed by the algorithm to solve a problem. Specifically, the learning style depends on whether labeled or unlabeled data was employed to train the model. Labeled data includes observations that are associated with a desired output such as a class or numeric value.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: Supervised_Learning indicates that labeled data has been used to train a model to yield the desired output.
Both labeled data and unlabeled data were used to inform the model.
The algorithm did not employ any labeled data and instead discovered patterns from unlabeled data.

DD_Attribute.name: algorithm_type
DD_Attribute.definition: The algorithm_type attribute describes the kind of algorithm used, such as a regression model, neural network, tree, etc.
DD_Attribute.comment: We plan to expand the list of permissible values.

DD_Permissible_Value.value_meaning: The algorithm used for data analysis is a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) Classifier.

DD_Attribute.name: algorithm_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The algorithm_name attribute specifies the name of the algorithm used.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_objective_function_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_objective_function_name attribute specifies the name of the objective function used.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_objective_function_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_objective_function_description attribute describes the objective function used.

DD_Attribute.name: performance_measure
DD_Attribute.definition: The performance_measure attribute specifies the name of the measure (or metric) used to report performance of the model on the test set.

DD_Attribute.name: performance_score
DD_Attribute.definition: The performance_score attribute reports the numeric score the model achieved using performance_measure on the test set. Values are not constrained since the measure may not be a strict metric. Examples could include accuracy, loss, runtime, memory consumption, etc.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_version_id attribute specifies the trained model version number.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_name attribute specifies the name of the model used.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_creation_date
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_creation_date attribute specifies the date that the model was created, in Year/Month/Day format.

DD_Attribute.name: optimization_algorithm_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The optimization_algorithm_name attribute specifies the name of the operation algorithm, e.g. "stochastic gradient descent."

DD_Attribute.name: optimization_algorithm_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The optimization_algorithm_description attribute specifies any additional details about the optimization algorithm.

DD_Attribute.name: optimization_algorithm_parameter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The optimization_algorithm_parameter_name attribute specifies the name of a parameter used, e.g. "conv1 learning rate," or "weight decay."

DD_Attribute.name: optimization_algorithm_parameter_value
DD_Attribute.definition: The optimization_algorithm_parameter_value attribute specifies the value of the named parameter, e.g. for a parameter "conv1 learning rate," the value could be "0.001."

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_hyperparameter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_hyperparameter_name attribute specifies the name of the hyperparameter, e.g. "batch size," "normalization method," "number of epochs," "conv1 dropout rate," "conv2 dropout rate."

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_hyperparameter_value
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_hyperparameter_value attribute specifies the value of the hyperparameter named, e.g."z-score" for normalization method, "100" for "number of epochs."

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_architecture_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_architecture_name attribute specifies the name of the architecture, e.g. "MSLNet."

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_architecture_version_id
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_architecture_version_id attribute specifies the architecture version number.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_architecture_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_architecture_description attribute specifies any additional details about the architecture.

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_method_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The calibration_method_name attribute specifies the name of the calibration used, e.g. "temperature scaling."

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_method_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The calibration_method_description attribute specifies any additional details about the calibration method used.

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_method_parameter_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The calibration_method_parameter_name attribute specifies the name of the parameter used, e.g. "temperature."

DD_Attribute.name: calibration_method_parameter_value
DD_Attribute.definition: The calibration_method_parameter_value attribute sepcifies the value of the named parameter, e.g. for a parameter "temperature," the value could be "1.31."

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_file_name
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_file_name attribute specifies the name of the trained model file.

DD_Attribute.name: trained_model_file_description
DD_Attribute.definition: The trained_model_file_description attribute specifies any additional details about the trained model file, e.g. the file format.

DD_Class.name: Data_Set
DD_Class.definition: The Data_Set class is the container for classes and attributes describing the size and version of data sets used by the machine learning model.Augmentation_Method, Augmentation_Method_Parameter, Preprocessing_Method, and Preprocessing_Method_Parameter are all optional.

DD_Class.name: Training_Set
DD_Class.definition: The Training_Set class belongs to the Data_Set class family and contains attributes that describe the size and version of the data set used to train the machine learning model.

DD_Class.name: Validation_Set
DD_Class.definition: The Validation_Set class belongs to the Data_Set class family and contains attributes that describe the size and version of the data set used to validate the machine learning model (e.g., to choose the best hyperparameters).

DD_Class.name: Test_Set
DD_Class.definition: The Test_Set class belongs to the Data_Set class family and contains attributes describing the size and version of the data set used to test the machine learning model (i.e., in terms of generalization to previously unseen data).

DD_Class.name: Augmentation_Method
DD_Class.definition: The Augmentation_Method class contains information about a data set's augmentation method.

DD_Class.name: Augmentation_Method_Parameter
DD_Class.definition: The Augmentation_Method_Parameter class contains information about a data set's augmentation method parameters, including their names and associated values.

DD_Class.name: Preprocessing_Method
DD_Class.definition: The Preprocessing_Method class contains information about a data set's preprocessing method.

DD_Class.name: Preprocessing_Method_Parameter
DD_Class.definition: The Preprocessing_Method_Parameter class contains information about a data set's preprocessing method parameters, including their names and associated values.

DD_Class.name: Test_Performance
DD_Class.definition: The Test_Performance class contains information about a trained model's performance on the test set.

DD_Class.name: Trained_Machine_Learning_Model
DD_Class.definition: The Trained_Machine_Learning_Model class is a container for information about how a given model was trained and evaluated. Machine_Learning_Algorithm, Training_Set, Optimization_Algorithm, Optimization_Algorithm_Parameter, Trained_Model_Hyperparameter, and Trained_Model_File are required, while Validation_Set, Test_Set, Test_Performance, Trained_Model_Architecture, Calibration_Method. and Calibration_Method_Parameter are optional.

DD_Class.name: Machine_Learning_Algorithm
DD_Class.definition: The Machine_Learning_Algorithm class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the algorithm type and learning style used. An external reference to a citation for the algorithm is required.

DD_Class.name: Optimization_Algorithm
DD_Class.definition: The Optimization_Algorithm class is a container for classes and attributes describing the optimization algorithm used.

DD_Class.name: Optimization_Algorithm_Parameter
DD_Class.definition: The Optimization_Algorithm_Parameter class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the optimization algorithm parameters used, including their names and associated values.

DD_Class.name: Trained_Model_Hyperparameter
DD_Class.definition: The Trained_Model_Hyperparameter class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the trained model hyperparameters, including their names and associated values.

DD_Class.name: Trained_Model_Architecture
DD_Class.definition: The Trained_Model_Architecture class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the trained model architecture. An internal reference to the architecture is optional.

DD_Class.name: Calibration_Method
DD_Class.definition: The Calibration_Method class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the Calibration Method. An external reference to a citation, such as a DOI, is optional.

DD_Class.name: Calibration_Method_Parameter
Trained_Model_File
DD_Class.definition: The Trained_Model_File class is a container for classes and and attributes describing the trained model file. An external reference for the trained model file is required.

DD_Class.name: Machine_Learning
DD_Class.definition: The Machine_Learning class is a container for all machine learning information in the label.

DD_Rule_Statement.rule_message: In ml:Trained_Model_Architecture, Internal_Reference.reference_type must be equal to 'class_to_document'.
